description: The biggest strike in Northern Ireland’s recent history is under way. An estimated 150,000 public sector workers are taking part in the walkouts over pay. description: More strike action is on the cards across Northern Ireland unless public sector workers receive their long-awaited pay award. title: Some people who share fake news on social media actually think they’re helping the world
